body.name: Redragon GW800 1080P PC Webcam with Built-in Dual Microphone, 360° Rotation - 2.0 USB Computer Web Camera - 30 FPS for Online Courses, Video Conferencing and Streaming
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 8 mins
features: 1080P HD Resolution - Advanced optical lens with fix-focus and light correction function, the webcam will get the picture fixed focus whether in light/dark environments. You will always look great and natural on camera in any lighting condition. (Note: Product appearance switching, there may be differences in the appearance of the old and new models.)

Two MEMS Microphones - HD audio is also provided by built-in dual MEMS mic, the anti-jamming stereo microphone will ensure that your communication is clear and stable. Your sound will be clearly captured and delivered just like a face to face conversation.

360-Degree Flexibility - Find your right angle or spot to have a video call, conference, or presentation with others, 360-degree horizontal rotation with 90-degree vertical rotation offers you the maximum possibility to show your advantage.

Easy to Mount - With a rotatable clip-on, you can set up the USB webcam firmly on any devices like laptop, display, etc.. It can also be placed securely on a table for other video recording needs such as hands + display gameplay streaming and so on.

Plug & Play - Equipped with a 2.0 USB jack for wider compatibility. It can be used smoothly on most operating systems and is compatible with a wide range of video software (Skype, Obs, Discord, MSN, Twitch, Youtube ...)

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 863 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Advanced Fix-focus Tech The fix-focus camera continues to display a clear and stable image, and does not randomly change focus due to light/dark environments or movement of the target. Eliminates awkward situations where the lens needs to be manually and repeatedly adjusted for a fixed focus. Mount it Anywhere With the universal clip-on that can be rotated freely, the camera can be placed securely in any position you want. 360-degree rotation offers unlimited options to help you find the most suitable video angle. Plug & Play without Drive The 2.0 USB interface supports desktop, notebook and mainstream computer systems such as XP, Vista, Win. 7, Win 8, Win 10, Mac and more. It doesn't require a driver, you can use it right away when you connect to your computer, and it supports many popular video recording, social media and streaming software.
GW800 GW910 Resolution 1920x1080 1920x1080 Refresh Rate 30FPS 30FPS Focus Fixed Focus Fixed Focus Digital Zoom × 5X Digital Zoom Privacy Cover × ✓ Built-in Mics ✓ ✓ 3-Level Ring Light × ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less Money, More Features
reviews.reviewText: Redragon has done it once again! Showing the big names that you can pack more features into one webcam without overcharging the customer. The two microphones pic up audio perfectly with no distortion. I love the 360 degree rotation with 90 degree articulation up and down. It allows me to have the camera where I want it and point it in an exact location. The front of the base is slightly notched and does not block the screen like other webcams do. The picture quality is great as you would expect from a 1080P webcam. A low light function is a must, and this camera delivers. The wider base and tighter joints than most webcams allows you to set it on you desk or shelf and be confident that it will stay pointed where you want it to. It has standard mounting for a tripod as well, so how you utilize is 100% up to you. It is truly plug and play, with USB 2.0 type A for a wide compatibility range. Lastly and probably my favorite thing, THEY INCLUDE A CLOTH FOR CLEANING THE LENS!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Perfect to place on top of your monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Redragon Webcam? A Solid Choice for Streams and Online Webcam usages.
reviews.reviewText: Its shipping was fast given its set date, and has worked perfectly since the day i got it.A friend of mine already had the webcam, and now another friend will also be getting nearly the same model. A solid recommendation- or a must have, if you have not had a proper webcam!I have used it with friends online, to show the surroundings of my home: And i think it works pretty well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good budget web camera
reviews.reviewText: Great price and worked flawlessly right out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good first webcam
reviews.reviewText: I have nothing to compare this to but it does it’s job and is decent for the money. I would say it’s a great starter webcam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Camera 2nd one
reviews.reviewText: This is a fine camera, 2nd one I have ordered - Amazon shipped me the older model but the actual seller tells me it is only cosmetic not functional differences, that being said it works quite well on my laptop, PC and especially on the Xbox one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low/Mid Quality Camera Stopped Working After 2 Years
reviews.reviewText: This worked alright for about two years. I was never impressed with the picture quality or the camera quality. The camera just stopped working after 2 years unprompted. I am disappointed and will avoid REDRAGON cameras moving forward.UPDATE: CS Reached out to me about my review and sent me a replacement which arrived very quickly and is functioning correctly. I greatly appreciate the customer support department of Redragon, which identified a dissatisfied customer quickly and made reasonable efforts to remedy the solution. While my rating and opinion of the product itself is has not changed, the responsiveness of the customer service was great.
Gostei tanto que comprei de novo, uma era pro meu marido e outra pra mim

Falta de nitidez !aún con un montón de iluminación y configuración da una calidad que deja mucho que desear!La comparo con mi Asus C3 y esta ultima da una imagen Increíble a comparación! y con un precio menor

reviews.reviewTitle: Best webcam and great build quality.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been using it for 6 months. Honestly it is a Logitech killer. This REDRAGON webcam is insane. High quality capture and sturdy built. The picture quality is best comparable with the webcams in 10K price segment. Highly recommended.

Works very well for the price has amazing quality video, mic isn't the best but if your using it for the camera than you scored it gives amazing video and can take great still shots. The mic is small like a laptop style mic so its sound quality is a little low but for a camera mic combo that 2orks great for streams and such than worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I needed a webcam for my work and this was the best bang for the buck. The lighting isn't the best however the picture quality in the day time is perfect for its needs. Can definitely recommend this to streamers as well, the focus isn't the best at all however it gets the job done!
